title: The Twitch
creator_credit: Al Sens, John Taylor and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A tale of intolerance and where it all ends, told in an animated cartoon about a king and his kingdom, and bigotry that had its day. The illustrations and dialogue are light and amusing, but that does not mask the moral of the story: that unless we tolerate individual differences - even the king’s nervous twitch - peace may only come when all are behind bars. Voice and narration: Pat Burns, George Geertsen (Awards: Sydney; Melbourne)
